DOC.brief_summary: To assess efficacy telmisartan hypertensive patient high cardiovascular risk
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Hypertensive patient BP . 140/90mmHgand high high cardiovascular risk accord ESH/ESC Guidelines 2007 prescriber take decision start treatment telmisartan 40 80 mg , without HCTZ 12.5 mg 25 mg , usual way line SmPC reimbursement criterion Exclusion criterion : Contraindications Summary Product Characteristics
